abstract.para: This is just the beginning of a draft of the future Anti-Spam HOWTO. Stay tuned.

sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: This HOWTO will address the impact of SPAM on computer users and networks, large and small. We will look at the problem and various solutions that are available to Linux administrators and users.
